document.docAuthor: Gobbi, Fernanda T. & Azevedo, Celso O.
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Caloapenesia (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae), with description of sixteen new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of Caloapenesia (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae), with description of sixteen new species

bibRefCitation.author: Terayama
bibRefCitation.refString: Terayama, M. (1995) Caloapenesia and Neoapenesia, new genera of the family Bethylidae (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea) from the Oriental Region with proposals two new synonymies of genera. Japanese Journal Entomology, 63, 881 - 891.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Caloapenesia thailandiana
Terayama, 1995
: 883
, ♂.
Holotype
, ♂. THAILAND , Khao yai National park, Nakhon Ratchasima, 700–800 m ,
18–24 .IV. 1990
, E. Fuller leg. [ PMAE ].

subSubSection.paragraph: This is one of the most common species of Caloapenesia in Thailand . However its specimens have shown few variations compared to the type series, such as the posterior margin of scutellar furrow not defined and the lateral carina of propodeal disc absent.

Material examined. THAILAND , Malaise trap,
